query: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.smshubCode, s.active, s.totalSales, COUNT(p.id) as price_count FROM services s LEFT JOIN prices p ON s.id = p.serviceId WHERE s.name IN ('Whatsapp', 'Picpay') GROUP BY s.id, s.name, s.smshubCode, s.active, s.totalSales
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 35dchGD4KrPJFby.root --database 2KeMNLvGvAyUJv9AEWkrsw --execute SELECT s.id, s.name, s.smshubCode, s.active, s.totalSales, COUNT(p.id) as price_count FROM services s LEFT JOIN prices p ON s.id = p.serviceId WHERE s.name IN ('Whatsapp', 'Picpay') GROUP BY s.id, s.name, s.smshubCode, s.active, s.totalSales
